caption.title: The probability density function (top) and cumulative distribution function (bottom) of the Gumbel distribution [ 22] (Eqs 2 and 3).
caption.p: The black and red curves show the effect of an increasing mu, whereas the black and green curves show the effect of an increasing β. An increase in μ is associated with an increase in magnitude, while an increase in β is linked to an increase in the range.
